name: CKShare.Participant
desc: An object that describes a user’s participation in a share.

items.name: var acceptanceStatus: CKShare.ParticipantAcceptanceStatus
items.desc: The current state of the user’s acceptance of the share.

items.name: enum CKShare.ParticipantAcceptanceStatus
items.desc: Constants that represent the status of a participant.

items.name: var permission: CKShare.ParticipantPermission
items.desc: The participant’s permission level for the share.

items.name: enum CKShare.ParticipantPermission
items.desc: Constants that represent the permissions to grant to a share participant.

items.name: var role: CKShare.ParticipantRole
items.desc: The participant’s role for the share.

items.name: enum CKShare.ParticipantRole
items.desc: Constants that represent the role of a share’s participant.
